forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 14C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 59F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High near 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 61F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 56F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later at night. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain after midnight. Low 52F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 56F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 10C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 51F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 13C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early then partly cloudy and windy later in the day. High 56F. Winds WNW at 20 to 30 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low around 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low around 50F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of light rain. Winds increasing late. High 13C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low around 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
